column4: how do I get my open programs to be listed in the top bar instead of the bar in the bottom of the screen ?
open programs?
yes as in eg. firefox, xchat and so on ...
great!! :) that easy ... thanks a bunch
or you can create a new window list by right mouse buttoning an empty bit of panel and going to add to panel...
is it possible to make the topbar 2 lines instead of one ?
sort of
you can set a panel's width and height
but not two lines ... with width and height it only makes the line bigger
you need your panel to be bigger
but what in particular did you want on two lines?
everything in the top panel or just a particular thing?
the programs listed in two lines, i tend to have a lot of open programs and it's very difficult to overview with just one line
that's doable
it will happen "by magic" if the panel itself is tall enough

as you've noticed, not everything will go on to two lines...
